name: The Blacksmith's Sticker Book
description:
Melt, shape and sharpen your weapon in The Blacksmith's Sticker Book!

Use your mouse and keyboard to complete some charming short mini games to create a dagger, sword or axe! Aim for the perfect weapon or just take your time with all of the objectives.

Now available as a sticker book - Burns, cuts and scrapes are no longer a threat in your forge!

---

This project was created in Godot for the Godot Wild Jam #53 - Assembly Required and used the wildcard

----

--------------------

Blacksmiths Sticker Book Godot Wild Jam #53

--------------------

Controls:

The majority of Blacksmiths Sticker Book is played with the mouse with minor key inputs.

Melting Metal:

Objective -

Melt metal in the forge by managing the current temperature (Shown slightly above the Bellows) to match the GOAL TEMP (Top of Screen) before the timer runs out.

Controls -

Left-Click on the Bellows at the right time to raise or lower the temperature as shown on the temperature gauge (Right Side of Screen)

Weapon Hammering:

Objective -

Hit all the marks that appear on the weapon before they disappear. The more you hit the better your score.

Controls -

Left-Click on the marks as they appear along the weapon before they disappear.

Weapon Cooling:

Objective -

Get the timer between the designated time frame the closer you get the better the score. The timer will disappear after a short time period so you'll need to keep track yourself.

Controls -

Left-Click on the START Button to begin the timer.

Left-Click on the STOP Button to stop the timer.

Weapon Sharpening:

Objective -

Sharpen the blade by filling up the bar through rapid key presses before the timer runs out.

Controls -

Alternate A and D to increase the progress bar.
